name: corvus
readme:
# Corvus ## An Asynchronous NodeJS HTTP Client for RavenDB Corvus is a node package for accessing RavenDB using its HTTP API. ### Installation npm install corvus Corvus does not have any dependencies other than nodejs and the mocha testing framework (only for development) ### Usage 

    var documentStore = new DocumentStore('192.168.0.101', 8080);
    var doc = { Name: 'Joe Smith', Email: 'joe@smith.com }
    documentStore.postDoc(doc, function (docDetails, error) {
        console.log("Doc created with key: " + docDetails.Key);
    });
### Currently supported functionality * GET, POST, PUT, DELETE ### In the works * PATCH * Support for non-default database * More things...
